scripts.validate: npm run format:check && npm run lint && npm run type-check && npm run test
scripts.validate:affected: npm run format:affected && npm run lint:affected && npm run type-check:affected && npm run test:affected
scripts.env:local: cp backend/.env.development backend/.env && cp backend/.env.development backend/.env.local && echo '✓ Switched to LOCAL development database'
scripts.env:staging: cp backend/.env.staging.local backend/.env && cp backend/.env.staging.local backend/.env.local && echo '✓ Switched to STAGING database'
scripts.env:production: cp backend/.env.production.local backend/.env && cp backend/.env.production.local backend/.env.local && echo '⚠️  Switched to PRODUCTION database (USE WITH CAUTION)'
scripts.env:status: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const env = fs.readFileSync('backend/.env', 'utf8'); const match = env.match(/NODE_ENV=(\w+)/); console.log('Current environment:', match ? match[1] : 'unknown');"
scripts.dev:local: npm run env:local && npm run dev:all
scripts.dev:staging: npm run env:staging && npm run dev:all
scripts.prisma:migrate:local: npm run env:local && cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev --schema=prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.prisma:migrate:staging: npm run env:staging && cd backend && npx prisma migrate deploy --schema=prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.prisma:migrate:production: npm run env:production && cd backend && npx prisma migrate deploy --schema=prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.prisma:studio:local: npm run env:local && cd backend && npx prisma studio --schema=prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.prisma:studio:staging: npm run env:staging && cd backend && npx prisma studio --schema=prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.seed:local: npm run env:local && npm run seed
scripts.seed:staging: npm run env:staging && npm run seed
